short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use reading list for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a reading list that has been simplified and is styled much nicer than the default Chrome reading list. 

You can:
- Save the current webpage, or any, as a URL with a display name 
  of your choosing
- Edit that saved item in your reading list top have whatever name you choose
- Delete items in your reading list

To come:
- Tagging entries
- Sort by tagged and by entry fields such as the name you choose 
  to display it as
